√sru 'flow'[1.] srávati etc. V.+ -te etc. E.+ śrúvat RV.
perfect: susrāva susruvus AV.+ susruma susruve etc. E.+
aorist: [3.] ásusrot etc. asusruvat asusravat asisravat -- [5.] asrāvīs
future: [1.] sraviṣyati etc. -- [2.] srotā
verbal: srutá AV.+ śruta srávitave srávitavaí
secondary: intensive: sosru- -- desiderative: susrūṣa- -- causative: srāvayati etc. AV.+ srāvayate etc. sravayati
derivatives: srū́ sruvá V.+ srava V.+ -sravin C. -srāva AV.+ srāvín B.+ srāvya E.+ srávaṇa V.+ srāvaṇa AV.+ -sravas E. sravát V. srúc? V.+ -srut V.+ srútya B. srutí V.+ srótas V.+ srotyā́ V.B. sravátha RV. srāvayitavyà MS.S.
Apparent forms and derivatives of this root are occasionally found with initical ś, even in V.; and BR. recognize a root 2śru, equivalent in meaning with sru.
